name: 物理化學實驗（二）
description: 使學生熟悉化學實驗技巧，並且與課本基本原理能互相驗證。
goals: To establish basic knowledge of physical chemistry lab
To solve problem of this topic
To conduct independent thinking on this topic
syllabus:
Exp 1 : A colorimetric chemical kinetics experiment  
Exp 2 : Persulphate-iodide clock reaction by initial rates method(I)  
Exp 3 : Persulphate-iodide clock reaction by initial rates method(II)  
Exp 4 : 鐵氰根離子(ferricyanide)氧化壞血酸(ascorbic acid)之動力學Exp 5 : Inversion of Sucrose  
Exp 6 : Kinetics of a diffusion controlled heterogeneous reaction by titration  
Exp 7 : Atomic spectra of two-electron systems : He and Hg  
Exp 8 : 簡易分光器之製作與光譜分析Exp 9 : Theoretical calculation for studying chemical bonding and properties  
Exp10 : 電子自旋共振(ESR)及核磁共振(NMR)

methodologies.note: 預備周講解與實驗實作
